trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> class represents a subnet in a <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Forest" />.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> class.

A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" />, указывающий контекст для данного объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the name of the subnet.

Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> class, using the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object and subnet name.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />, используя указанные объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> и имя подсети.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> specifies a configuration set, but no AD LDS instance was found.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="context" /> задает набор конфигураций, но экземпляр AD LDS не был найден.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Вызов базовой службы каталогов завершился ошибкой.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: Это исключение возникает по одной из следующих причин.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="context" /> не ссылается на допустимый лес, набор конфигураций, контроллер домена или сервер AD LDS.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subnetName" /> is an empty string.
<paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="subnetName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="context" /> или <paramref name="subnetName" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that specifies the context for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" />, указывающий контекст для данного объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the name of the subnet.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the name of the site that contains the subnet.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see cref="T:System.String" />, указывающее имя узла, содержащего подсеть.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> class, using the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object, subnet name, and site name.
trans-unit.target: Инициализирует экземпляр класса <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />, используя указанные объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" />, имя подсети и имя узла.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> specifies a configuration set, but no AD LDS instance was found.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="context" /> задает набор конфигураций, но экземпляр AD LDS не был найден.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Вызов базовой службы каталогов завершился ошибкой.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: Это исключение возникает по одной из следующих причин.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" /> does not refer to a valid forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="context" /> не ссылается на допустимый лес, набор конфигураций, контроллер домена или сервер AD LDS.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subnetName" /> or <paramref name="siteName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="subnetName" /> или <paramref name="siteName" /> является пустой строкой.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" />, <paramref name="subnetName" />, or <paramref name="siteName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Значение параметра <paramref name="context" />, <paramref name="subnetName" /> или <paramref name="siteName" /> равно <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
Deletes the subnet that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Вызов базовой службы каталогов завершился ошибкой.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> еще не сохранен в хранилище доменных служб Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: Указанная учетная запись не имеет разрешения на выполнение этой операции.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
Releases all resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if the managed resources should be released; <see langword="false" /> if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
trans-unit.target: Значение <see langword="true" />, если следует освободить управляемые ресурсы; значение <see langword="false" />, если следует освободить только неуправляемые ресурсы.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Освобождает неуправляемые (а при необходимости и управляемые) ресурсы, используемые объектом <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext" /> object that is valid for this subnet.
The name of the subnet to find.
Returns a subnet that is based on a subnet name.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает подсеть на основе ее имени.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> for the requested subnet.
In the <paramref name="context" /> parameter that was specified, the site could not be found for the given <paramref name="subnetName" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: В указанном параметре <paramref name="context" /> не удалось найти узел для заданного параметра <paramref name="subnetName" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Вызов базовой службы каталогов завершился ошибкой.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
This exception will occur for any of the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: Это исключение возникает по одной из следующих причин.

trans-unit.source: The target in the <paramref name="context" /> parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or AD LDS server.
trans-unit.target: Целью в параметре<paramref name="context" /> не является лес, набор конфигураций, контроллер домена или сервер AD LDS.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="subnetName" /> is an empty string.
<paramref name="context" /> or <paramref name="subnetName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Параметр <paramref name="context" /> или <paramref name="subnetName" /> имеет значение <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> еще не сохранен в хранилище доменных служб Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
Gets or sets the location description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Получает или задает описание расположения объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: The location description of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Вызов базовой службы каталогов завершился ошибкой.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
Gets the subnet name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
The name of the subnet.
The object has been disposed.
Writes any changes to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object to the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: Записывает любые изменения объекта <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> в хранилище доменных служб Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The subnet object already exists.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Вызов базовой службы каталогов завершился ошибкой.

trans-unit.source: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.
trans-unit.target: Указанная учетная запись не имеет разрешения на выполнение этой операции.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Получает или задает узел, членом которого является объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite" /> object for the site that the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object is a member of.
trans-unit.target: Объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite" />, соответствующий узлу, членом которого является объект <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: Applies to set only.
The specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite" /> object does not exist.
If it was newly created, it must be committed to the directory store before assigning it to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Если он был только что создан, его необходимо зафиксировать в хранилище каталога перед назначением объекту <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySubnet" />.

trans-unit.source: The object has been disposed.
Returns the name of the subnet.
A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the name of the subnet.
The object has been disposed.
